## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G04580](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G04580)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>EIN4</u>
- **Gene Name:** ETHYLENE INSENSITIVE 4
- **Description:**   Signal transduction histidine kinase, hybrid-type, ethylene sensor;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2084968
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G04580.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G04580.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT3G04580.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G04580.2)
## Gene Ontology:
   - [GO:0010105](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0010105)&nbsp;---&nbsp;acts upstream of or within&nbsp;---&nbsp;negative regulation of ethylene-activated signaling pathway

   - [GO:0004673](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0004673)&nbsp;---&nbsp;enables&nbsp;---&nbsp;protein histidine kinase activity
   - [GO:0004674](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0004674)&nbsp;---&nbsp;enables&nbsp;---&nbsp;protein serine/threonine kinase activity
   - [GO:0038199](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0038199)&nbsp;---&nbsp;enables&nbsp;---&nbsp;ethylene receptor activity
   - [GO:0005783](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0005783)&nbsp;---&nbsp;located in&nbsp;---&nbsp;endoplasmic reticulum
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS71770]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Constitutive ethylene response phenotype. Seedlings with compact cotyledons and downwardly-curved morphology.
   - [CS71771]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Constitutive ethylene response phenotype. Small rosette.
   - [CS71815]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;No visible phenotype.
   - [CS72383]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;mild constitutive ethylene response phenotype; reduced leaf size; short roots with greater density of root hairs
   - [CS8053]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;ethylene insensitive.
